amendment.description: Amendment requires the President to notify congressional committees at least 15 days in advance of each reduction of debt that will be made under the provisions of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add notification requirements which apply to the President when debt reduction procedures are being implemented.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 1 (Roll No. 61).
